item.title: Welcome to Hugo
item.description:
So previously I was using Pelican which is still a solid option for me, but since Hugo is so popular I thought that I would take a look at it. That, and a workflow publishing from Org mode, which is no longer just an Emacs thing, not that I care.

Happy with what I see so far. Stay tuned.
